mapper.select: select good_name goodName, good_prec goodPric, good_lib_save goodNum, good_price goodPrice, good_selling_price goodSale, good_image_url goodImageList from t_good_manage where is_delete = 0 and good_code = #{goodCode}

select comment_code evaCode, comment_rank evaRank, tuser.user_name evaUserName, teva.comment_content evaContent, teva.comment_images conmentImage, teva.comment_time evaTime from t_goods_goodseva teva, t_user_infomation tuser where teva.user_code = tuser.user_code and teva.comment_good = #{goodCode} and teva.is_delete = 0
and ( teva.comment_rank >= 0 and teva.comment_rank <= 2)
and ( teva.comment_rank > 2 and teva.comment_rank <= 3)
and ( teva.comment_rank > 3 and teva.comment_rank <= 5)

SELECT tstore.shop_name storeName, tstore.shop_detail_address storeAddress, tstore.provinceCode provinceCode, tstore.cityCode cityCode, distinctCode distinctCode FROM t_store_bind tbind, t_store_information tstore WHERE tbind.shop_code = tstore.shop_code and tbind.user_code = #{userCode} and tbind.is_delete = 0

SELECT t3.name1 provinceCode, t3.code1 pro, t3.name2 cityCode, t3.code2 cit, t4.dict_name distinctCode, t4.dict_code dis FROM ( SELECT t1.dict_code code1, t1.dict_name name1, t1.dict_parent_node parentcode1, t2.dict_code code2, t2.dict_name name2, t2.dict_parent_node parentcode2 FROM t_dict t1 LEFT JOIN t_dict t2 ON t1.dict_code = t2.dict_parent_node WHERE t1.dict_parent_node is null ) t3 LEFT JOIN t_dict t4 ON t3.code2 = t4.dict_parent_node having pro = #{provinceCode} and cit = #{cityCode} and dis = #{distinctCode}
mapper.update: update t_good_manage set good_through_num = good_through_num + 1, update_user = #{updateUser}, good_update_time = now() where good_code = #{goodCode}
